title: Robotics Dataset Comparison
description: A comprehensive overview and comparative analysis of 16 mainstream robotics datasets and frameworks, including LeRobot, Open X-Embodiment, DROID, RoboTurk, MIME, Meta-World, RoboNet, RoboSet, BridgeData V2, RT-1, DobbÂ·E, RH20T, BC-Z, MT-Opt, VIMA, and SPOC.

title: Wheel-Based Humanoid Robots
description: An overview of notable wheel-based humanoid robots, highlighting their developers, descriptions, applications, features, advantages, and disadvantages.
